Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to prohibiting drug or alcohol testing and screening of pregnant women
Summary: Relates to prohibiting drug or alcohol testing and screening of pregnant women unless the woman consents or the testing or screening is necessary for a medical emergency.
LawCode: Add ยง2509-b, Pub Health L; amd ยง6530, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the education law, in relation to prohibiting drug or alcohol testing and screening of pregnant persons
